How many people are affected by dystrophic epidermolysis bullosa ?,"Considered together, the incidence of all types of dystrophic epidermolysis bullosa is estimated to be 6.5 per million newborns in the United States. The severe autosomal recessive forms of this disorder affect fewer than 1 per million newborns.",GHR,dystrophic epidermolysis bullosa
